tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Incumbent motherhood is fraught with countless anxieties, that too if it is your first pregnancy!!!
It was thus a very opportune experience for me to have Dr Neelam Walia for the duration of my pregnancy

** ****** ** **** ******** ** *** *********.
The best thing about her is that she can be tough if she sees that you are doing something which is not right for Mother or Baby but deep inside it is the love & care for you that makes her do that.

She is experienced, approachable & always their for her patients.
If you are searching for a Gynaecologist in sarita vihar or nearby i would strongly recommend her.

All the best Dr Neelam :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife conceived after a miscarriage. Happened to meet Dr.Neelam with reference of my sister in law. Her pregnancy was complicated from the beginning itself. But Dr.Neelam gave her full guidance and support throughout the pregnancy. At one time it was looking like that this pregnancy will not continue any further but by God's grace and Dr.Neelam's guidance and treatment she delivered a healthy baby normally. We stay in Gurgaon but still we use to come all the way to her at Delhi. She helped us a  lot and God bless her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Being a first time mom made me very sceptical and like everybody else I was looking for the best consultation and medical support. After much research and references from friends, I zeroed in on Dr Neelam and post my first visit to her, my decision was reaffirmed. She made me and my husband very comfortable and turned out to be the no-fuss doctor, as my husband and I wanted for my pregnancy. The most important feature of the visits is how humane a touch she adds to each consultation, giving adequate time to solve each query.  Would recommend her especially for first time mothers.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i am very happy & pleased. have got peace in life & end to my problem & worries. A very sincere Doctor, cleared all my doubts and brought positivity in me. Worth Visiting her & coming from almost 30kms away. Really blessed to have Mam as my Gynae. She has the most courteous staff who take great care of Attending Patient.

tags: None
review: Very nice Doctor, Humble and explained everything in proper manner. Feeling better after first consultation. Gives enough time and listens everything thoroughly and makes the patient comfortable . All doubts related to pregnancy were cleared by her. A big thumbs up to Dr walia

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Earlier visited her for my cyst problem & having high bp i was a high risk pregnancy case. she has been supportive all through out my pregnancy, listened to our problems patiently & now i am blessed with a baby girl after all her sincere efforts & care.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I really admire her. Listens carefully to all the problems. I was consulting some other gynae for 4 months regarding my pregnancy but was not satisfied with her behaviour nor treatment. Visited Dr walia on a friend's recommendation & i am in my seventh month of pregnancy & all is going right till now under Dr Neelam's Guidance.
Thanks for all your concern Doctor.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ******** ********* ********** I had some complications & was a high risk case i didn't want to take any chances with any other doctor. She had given me few medicines & after the completion of the course, i was cured of the problem i was facing. It was quiet quick & effective.
i have full faith in her treatment. I am very happy with the way she has treated me.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Quite approachable & friendly.Talked about my problem with her without any hesitation. Does not suggests tests to be done from her own clinic. Can freely do it from anywhere which was a positive thing i liked & with over 40 years of  experience i can bank upon her for any problem. highly satisfied with her.

tags: Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
She is a positive person with positive vibes. I have no second thoughts to take any second opinion from another Gynae regarding my pregnancy.
Have been associated with her for long now.talks to the point, practical & no nonsense Doctor. She keeps her patient in a positive frame of mind always.

Highly experienced, have referred many of my folks to her and all of them are satisfied with her.

Thanks Doc.

review: The Doctor was available at the time of the appointment. Listens Carefully about the symptoms & nature of discomfort before proceeding further, The best part is she does not prescribe unnecessary medicines or suggests unnecessary tests which is a common practice these days.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I went for a General check up and advice on my contraceptives. The doctor is really good. Hears everything very patiently.She does not suggest unnecessary Tests and Medicines. Very straight forward person.Explains the diagnosis to the Patient in detail, gives very genuine opinion & is very reasonable too

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had Miscarriage earlier. Visited many Gynecologists around but was not able to get relief. had visited Dr Neelam on some friend's recommendation. now i am in my fifth month of pregnancy & going good so far. She certainly is my lucky charm. just can't wait to see my baby. All the credit goes to the  Doctor for proper advise & treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Neelam is very friendly & humble
Answers all doubts very patiently. 
Communicates very well with the patient* ****** ******* *********** ************* ** ******** **********
well equipped facilities are available at her centre.
wish to thank her from the bottom of my heart for my pregnancy.
would recommend my family & friends to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Walia has been a good gynaecologist among the doctors i had visited.
She spends enough time with each patient and treated me with care. It is easy to clear my doubts with her. Also she never recommends any extra test or scan unless needed.
  
Thanks a lot Dr Neelam Walia for all your care and love.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor doesn't seem friendly and didn't explained things well. *** *** **** ******* **** ***** **** *** ********** she was like- "u can take medicines form us. we will take the blood sample and give u the report, don't go any other lab for checkup, take the medicines from her clinic only etc."
she has given us about 2mins only while there was no other patient waiting.
reply_text: Have seen your Prescription and no doctor can do such thorough check up within two minutes. I never force any patient for taking medicines or getting lab tests done from our centre.  Wish you good health always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Me and my husband wanted to whole heartedly thank Dr. Neelam for her positive guidance and support throughout my pregnancy.Today, in my third pregnancy we became proud parents of a baby boy.Pregnancy was never easy for me. Since 2014 I lost two pregnancies before we were blessed with our little prince now. We lost hope of having a positive pregnancy. However, as a last hope we consulted Dr Neelam and with her motivation and guidance we succeeded.Thank you mam for your love and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wonderful Doctor. had the best experience so far and really happy that have conceived under her guidance. i have suffered for almost 11 years going through endless procedures had given up completely. after a year of consultation with Dr Neelam would say have got fruitful results. Really Grateful for all the efforts taken by her in my case.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: A couple keen to become parents & were facing infertility issues & adding to our woes. Since we visited Dr walia things started to get better. She has motivated us all the time and did not give up till we got this good news of realising our dream of having a baby now. She has been a great listener and has given considerable amount of time to me every single time i met her. In today's date hardly any renowned Doctor gives time to his/her patient. The way she has dealt with our case and handled it is very impressive. Would recommend her to all the couples facing infertility issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I read the reviews on Practo and decided to go for Dr Walia. However, our experience was not good at all. A typical doctor friendliness was missing. When I tried to join my wife during consultation she asked me to stay outside in what sounded like a rough tone. Even the whole consultation with my Wife was not very satisfying. All the time it seemed like Dr Walia was trying to figure out the issue. She has a long experience *** ***** ** ****** *** **** *** **** ** *** **** Nevertheless, we have decided not to consult with her again after this experience.
reply_text:
Appreciate your effort and time to post a feedback.
Would like to address your concerns here:-
Due to the ongoing pandemic the Doctor allows only the patient into her chamber.
Patient’s attendant is allowed to have a conversation with the doctor after the consultation is over. 
Sincere Apologies if you felt that the Doctor’s tone wasn’t polite though the Doctor never speaks in a rude manner with any Patient.
The Doctor has to go through everything in detail without hurrying and advise the patient accordingly.
Doctor has to correlate the patient’s ultrasound and other report findings to reach a conclusion and start the treatment accordingly.
Hope have been able to address the concerns raised by you.

Thank you
Regards
Dr Walia

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I was suffering from irregular periods and hormonal imbalance problem & consulted two gynecs in the same locality but inspite of their treatment and heavy intake of medicines my problem wasnt rectified. Thereafter i visited Dr Neelam and found her to be much experienced and understands your problem quickly, analyses the root causes. She will advice and explains everything in detail with patience.

She doesn't make you go through unnecessary scans unless needed. I was treated with right medications though i had many issues i was able to conceive within 6 months. Me and my husband are very happy and thankful to Neelam mam for solving my problem giving right solution.

If we have any queries she is reachable through phone and replies in emergency situations & she has 24 hours emergency facility if required

even her staff members are very good and approachable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Visited her for PCOS treatment with the intention of getting pregnant. Taking her advise of doing workout and having the medicines she prescribed, 
 we got lucky. had regular follow ups with her as i had a history of miscarriage previously. She has been polite during every visit and prescribed the required tests regularly to keep a check on any issues that may arise. Although I had infections several times during pregnancy, she prescribed medication which got things under control. We were finally blessed with a healthy baby girl this month. We are really thankful to  Dr Walia for taking up our case.

If you are having similar issues and looking for a good doc, she is definitely the one.Visit her without any doubts and you will not be disappointed.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: had a fun filled normal delivery despite having complications - Thyroid, Diabetes, Fibroids. Dr neelam never made me feel all these things were complicated only after i delivered she told me about all this. She prepared me very well for a normal delivery. With so many Complication other doctor would have recommended me casearian section whereas Dr neelam never insisted for it. She never lets you spend unnecessarily during your pregnancy period. She rather made my pregnancy journey experience very memorable. She is a no nonsense Doctor & very transparent with the patient who doesnt believe in ripping you off. I am further following up with her post delivery now and Truly recommend her.. All the best!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Excellent ... Very analytical & responsive. & fast result .captured the things in first go where reputed hospitals could not do for years. . I was confused in selecting my gynecologist. I was not satisfied with the Doctors in the big Hospitals. Finally i met her and i decided to carry along my rest of check ups with her. It was a smooth sailing during my antenatal period. The best part of her is that she senses the problems very well and tries to rectify each problem. All went well and delivered a baby boy... Now visiting Dr K.S Walia for all the immunizations and vaccinations of my baby in the same establishment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We were Devasted when other Doctors recommended my wife to go for MTP after seeing the ultrasound reports. In between we were suggested by a family friend to visit Dr neelam. Even though we were not very keen to but visited her. She saw our reports *** **** *** ** ***** ********* & 
 further investigation she made us believe that our child is absolutely normal.
We continued to consult her & had full faith in her.
My Daughter is 3 years old & is absolutely a beautiful, healthy & normal child.
Cant thank her much & my wife is expecting again & we are consulting Dr Neelam for her Checkups.
God Bless You Doctor & Wish u all the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Infertility problems are increasing now a days and this is the best place where one can get positive results. I was diagnosed with PCOD much before my marriage & was in this constant fear that i wont be able to conceive. When we thought to plan for a baby we visited Dr Neelam at her clinic. She explained  everything in a proper manner & i had this feeling in the first consultation with her that i will get positive results & after 3 months of her treatment i have conceived. Would definately  recommend her to all patients with infertility problems.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnant,Nutrition for Pregnant Women,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Dr. Neelam is honestly a good doctor of any kind that I have ever had the pleasure of seeing.  She is so intuitive, understanding, kind. I never felt rushed or pressured. I also felt extremely comfortable with her in every way. We were fortunate to have her as our doctor for multiple pregnancies. If you get the chance to get her as a doctor you are going to have a great experience.. Keep up your amazing work because there are not many doctors out there that possess all of your attributes and characteristics.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: After having a terrible experience at a previous OB/GYN I had a friend refer me to Walia Medical & Maternity Centre and I'm glad she did. I started going to them when I was around 16 weeks pregnant. They always make me feel welcome when I come in and know me by name now. Currently 33 weeks pregnant I usually never have to wait more than 20 minutes in the lobby to be seen. Wonderful place!!!.They are there to help, they are honest and they care. Its the best place to go to and i refer this clinic to all my female colleagues.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Neelam was the opposite of another gyno I saw in that she did not rush me or try to placate me in any way. Not only did she listen to me but she also asked very pointed questions and not the way other doctors who i found judgemental she asked really specific questions about my medical records and history. She also was able to give me some definitive guidance and answers on things in a way no other doctor has.  She is very calm and soft-spoken. I went through the procedure smoothly & it was a pleasant experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: If you are lucky enough to garner Dr. Neelam as your OB/Gynae, count your lucky stars. Every review below is accurate. She’s incredibly kind, thorough, and is a good human being. Yes — her clinic is busy and wait times can be excruciating - but book first or last during the day and times are reasonable. Dr Walia indulges every question you might have and her answers/explanations always satisfy your concerns. . I can’t imagine having gone through my first pregnancy with anyone else. She was right there till I delivered. Brilliant doctor in care and professionalism!! You know she loves her job.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: What we look in any doctor when we consult?  1) She must be genuine & guide properly 2) Less Expensive for medicines and reports 3) Polite, calm and can be reachable any time. I am satisfied in all above three main parameters with Dr. Walia for my 2nd baby & during entire 9 months of consultation. She is absolutely Genuine, punctual and perfect. She always replies to your queries, If emergency, can contact over phone, Only required scan & medicines. I recommend her for delivery and any kind of Gynecology issues. Regards, Mrs Rashi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** **** ************* * **** **** ****** ** ****
After visiting several other gynecs can vouch for her as the most friendly and 
has an expertise in her field, definately an edge over others.

No other doctor has been able to match the way she approaches the patient's issues.

gives considerable time, has lot of patience to listen to your issues 

have taken treatment for infertility for 8 months and can say now that all reports have come out positive. 

so far very satisfied. highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I m writing this feedback on behalf of my wife after almost 5 months of visiting and receiving treatment from Dr Neelam. It has been fruitful visiting her as ** **** *** **** ********** ***** *** *** ****** ******** ***** *** ******** ******** *** **********
Would definately recommend Dr Neelam to couples who have infertility or order gynaecological complications as she gives correct line of treatment and has very nominal charges of consultation which we found to be the best part as well as the experience she carries with her. Overall we found the clinic staff to be helpful and caring . The Doctor deserves to be complimented the most as without her we couldnt start our journey to parenthood.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: she is very nice and excellent at work, we had so many problems and she sorted out all one by one by taking right decision at right time. After visiting so many hospital and clinic I found this place very friendly and helpful and nobody in clinic never made me feel that I have problem. All doctors and staff is very polite and supportive. Waiting time is more but doesn't matter when you know you are meeting the right doctor . I strongly recommend Doctor Neelam because she has perfection in her work. I felt very safe and comfortable and in capable hands. Best and caring staff I have ever encountered. It was a wonderful experience. Thanks to Dr.Neelam for all your support and care and to all staff in your centre.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited Dr Neelam walia Yesterday , At very first level I feel so that i have reached some wrong place as I was taking treatment from somewhere else and i was not happy with the previous doctor so I went her for 2nd opinion . she listened me very calmly , deeply she gone through with my previous reports and prescription and then suggested for the further guidance for medicine . She was very friendly during the health check up . she didn't recommended any medicine or any test . It was great experience with her , I would recommend others too go there as she will not give unnecessary medicine or ask for test from outside . 

Thank you !

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
One of the fine Gynaecologist in the city.I came to Delhi and got settled with my wife in 2016. We always had preference for big hospitals but after visiting one multi-super-specialty hospital during third month of my wife's pregnancy i decided to choose a doctor and not a hospital and zeroed on Dr.Neelam.

We believe that for pregnancy and delivery of every women the doctor should be very approachable in all aspects and ought to have a pleasing personality to make patients comfortable.

Dr Neelam is a very calm and composed doctor. She patiently addressed all our queries & concerns. She handled the entire pregnancy period with full warmth and professional expertise. We highly recommend Dr Neelam for any Gynae and pregnancy issues.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: She listened my Problem very well and then treated me and suggested me medication. I felt good to visit their and will recommend to other as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Friendly and a patient listener. Feeling relieved after the treatment. It's good to have a nice experienced doctor nearby my home.

tags: None

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr.Neelam Walia is very kind and gentle.I had the most co-operative and helpful experience with her..After consulting with her,I was very calm and got the confidence that everything will be fine and back to the normal ..very thankss..to her..

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Always a wonderful experience! Answers all of my questions and I never feel rushed. Dr. Neelam is attentive and engaged providing me with all the answers to my many questions throughout my entire appointment. She is a wonderful woman with so much amazing knowledge and experience to share with her patients. Thanks for everything.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am a loyal patient of  Dr. Neelam. She is very technical, thorough, nice, and convincing since being a technical person, I researched the consequences and treatments, and she informed me of all the options before I even asked! This instilled a lot of confidence in me, so I decided to let her do what she thinks is best for me.  Besides, the staff is also wonderful!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a good & sweet Doctor. We can face any complication in pregnancy but if you follow her treatment wisely you wont face any problem. She builds lot of confidence in you. Does not suggest any unnecessary scan until she has some doubt in mind. Have delivered a healthy baby & really happy with Dr Walia's care & guidance throughout my pregnancy. Thank you Ma'am for the endless support.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Delivery,
review: My experience with Dr Neelam has always been incredible. We had both of our children with Ma'am and were so impressed by the care my babies and I received. My continued care with my gynecology appointments makes me feel comfortable to keep coming back to her indefinitely.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Thank you from the bottom of my heart to Dr. Walia... She supported me from the beginning and gave me so much hope to get through such a hard time during my pregnancy and delivery. Needless to mention my level of anxiety and low confidence after earlier failed pregnancies. She gave us so much confidence during all consultations. Her hand in surgery is excellent as she operated me for my D&C and delivery both.  We are so glad we chose to take this journey with her...

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: A clean environment and hospitality makes it so special and unique from other hospitals. I have visited ma'am few times and the way I have been attended so far is really appreciative, I was explained each and every stage of my check up,  looking forward to get positive results at the earliest.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: First pregnancy is altogether a different experience. It can make anyone nervous and anxious as there are so many changes happening in the body. But thanks to Dr Neelam Walia. I enjoyed my pregnancy as she answered all my queries in a very detailed manner, made me comfortable. And her friendly behaviour lessened my anxiety.  All this is exactly what a pregnant patient needs

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr Neelam for Dilatation & Curettage ,Her centre is govt approved. OT is very clean,staff is also very efficient.Procedure was painless under anaesthesia done at very nominal price whereas other centres were charging double or triple of the amount for the procedure. Had a very pleasant experience. Recommend her to all in need of a good Gynae.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After having two miscarriages and difficulty to conceive naturally, we went to Dr. Neelam at walia medical centre as a last resort. She has a very systematic approach of treating her patients and doesn't give false hopes.In a matter of few cycles she nailed my problem and I conceived. She gives only that treatment which is necessary and doesn't call for unnecessary tests. Now I am 8 months pregnant and going strong. We completely attribute our success story to her approach of treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: ** ****** ** ********* *** ** *** ****** ************** ** *** ***** Her confidence and empathetic nature will reassure you that you are in good hands. My experience with Dr Neelam, from the pre-natal visits to the delivery and subsequent post natal check-up, has been extremely pleasant. I would definitely recommend her to all my friends & acquaintances.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
An effort to make your nine month journey unforgettable " Every single word is true. She is a very dedicated Doctor, as described by many patients. Never seen such a Dedicated Doctor before. Being a high risk pregnancy i delivered full term & normally Could not ask for more. Listened to every problem of ours & guided us. Followed her advice Firmly & today our family is complete. 
God bless you always Mam.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The  first impression of Neelam Walia is she is awesome as a Doctor. She has really comforted me in my tough times and my entire journey has been very pleasant. I did have complication in my 3rd month but she continuously monitored me. Delivered healthy baby girl and my entire family is grateful to her for being such a support.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have known Dr Walia since 6 years now....I got to know about PCOD problem & with her medication and advice to loose weight has helped me conceive twice and I have been blessed with one boy and one girl.  Overall she is an experienced Doctor. Recommend her to all needing quality care regarding Female issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I visited her totally worried and confused as I had low AFI . She spent considerable time clearing all my doubts. I discussed all my issues with her. She gave a different view of my problem that it wasn't serious at all whereas other Gynaecs had scared me a lot. She is a  very experienced Gynae. will visit her for my checkups going forward.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: if someone is having pregnancy related problem then one should visit Dr Neelam. *** **** **** ** ****. have seen many successful cases including me visiting her for pregnancy related problems. The doctor values the patient's time & whenever i have been called at a particular time she is there at that very moment. her treatment has shown a positive result. happy with her completely.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Neelam Walia is my favorite gynecologist. She can put anyone at ease and has a pleasing personality . She is also extremely well known Gynaecologist .have no complaints till date with Dr Walia and this is my third baby i am consulting her for. would not think of going to any other doctor in Delhi apart from her for any Gynae Related Problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good Gynec & good human being. After visiting her there is nothing to worry about.  i had many queries which she addressed in a proper way which made me very comfortable. *** ********** ********* *** ********* Attending staff was very helpful. Gives enough time during consultation which i liked a lot.will keep consulting her during my pregnancy period.Recommend to everyone who need a good Gynec.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Was depressed since many years as we were trying for a baby but with no success. Met several Gynaecologists around Delhi & Gurgaon but always had to be dissapointed. A year back had consulted Dr walia for our ongoing worries. She calmed us down and after her proper counselling and treatment i was able to conceive. now we are looking forward for our new family member. Thanks to Dr Walia for all her support, care & guidance.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** ******* She has been my Gynae for few years now and both my daughters were delivered under her supervision. Had normal deliveries despite having severe cholestasis. Can't thank her enough. 1000/1000 ratings for the Doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very helpful doctor.  Met her with lots of stress and anxiety because of accidental pregnancy. I was very tensed for abortion procedure, She made me very comfortable.  Procedure was done without any complications.  Very good Doctor with good facilities and a welcoming staff.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Listens with patience & explains everything very clearly. Went to her regarding PCOD problem .  Made me feel absolutely comfortable. She is not money minded and always advises cost effective treatment. Her consultancy fee of 500 is nominal too whereas other doctors who are less experienced than ma'am charge double the amount of consultation with less delivered results. Highly recommend her clinic to everyone who want to visit for any Gynae related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor deserves lot of appreciation for her dedication towards her patients.  She has always heard me and my husband when ever we have had any doubt throughout my pregnancy. Truly appreciate her treatment methods, ability to accurately diagnose all the issues and guide us through the entire process.

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She had Got my wife scan done & diagnosed PCOD as the cause for not conceiving. Gave her medicine & Focussed on her diet & gave us a chart to follow. thankfully she has conceived. She is good at handling all the pregnancy related issues. Has always given honest view rather than mentioning tests & plenty of medicines. Very supportive Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Consult the doctor for the first time during first week of pregnancy, she suggested some medicine and ask me to visit with ultrasound report after 4 weeks. since i had complications before this pregnancy, she prescribed medicine once examined all the historical prescriptions and reports. highly recommended 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My entire experience was great actually, The staff was accommodating and Dr. Neelam is professional, efficient, empathetic, and also delightfully quick witted. she takes the time for all her patients so seeing her is worth the wait.  Appointment was almost on time. I came away with that warm feeling of confidence, knowing I was being very well cared for.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Very friendly and informative. Appreciate the quickness from arrival to end of appointment. Very clean office. Dr Neelam was wonderful and very pleasant.
I recommend her practice to all women for personal health and feminine health. Thanks for always making my experience comfortable!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Female Infertility Treatment,
review: \"Dr. Neelam was my OB\/Gynae for my son. Despite the unusual circumstances of going through this experience during the current pandemic, she made me feel at ease throughout the entire duration of my pregnancy and delivery. She has always been very responsive to all my questions and addressing all my concerns in a calm and timely manner.\

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: From professionalism to punctuality, *** ********* * I would highly suggest anyone journeying through fertility/infertility, have this team care for you! Dr. Neelam takes her time with you, is very informative, and will provide insight on all the possible scenarios/outcomes. Her plans for your care are always thorough and well outlined, I never questioned any of my protocols! Highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I saw Dr Neelam for a d&c following missed abortion. As a nurse who works in fertility I was blown away by how positive this experience was, considering I had a miscarriage. The procedure was quick and completely painless. The Staff was knowledgeable and sensitive and took such good care of me. I honestly cannot recommend Dr Neelam enough. It's extremely obvious why many patients have positive reviews for the Doctor. I will be forever grateful for the kindness and care they showed me.

Highly recommend maam to all females having any sort of gynae related issues.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,

review: I really enjoyed my pregnancy experience with Dr. Neelam. She is so kind, patient, and thoughtful- never making me feel rushed during my appointment. She answered all my questions and provided extra resources and alternative options when I wasn’t sure what I should do. I highly recommend her and will definitely come back to her for my future pregnancies.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Neelam really is everything that you could ever hope for in a doctor, After suffering 6 miscarriages and repeated and habitual doctors telling me that everything is normal I saw Dr Neelam.My first appointment was a non pregnancy consultation.It was her assurance, dedication,professional and competent demeanor that kept me going.she assured me that I would have a baby..I am currently pregnant and keeping my fingers crossed. Dr Neelam Thank You for caring and for believing in your craft

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My doctor referred me to this specialist and I had such an amazing experience with Doctor Neelam.  She explained every procedure and treatment option to help me make an informed decision. Very professional and knowledgeable too. I will recommend her for any obstetrical/gynecological care.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had a Medical Termination Pregnancy consultation with Dr Neelam, and the experience was just what I had hoped for. She was friendly, nice and ready to answer any questions and doubts regarding the procedure. were very happy with the the whole experience.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Have found Dr Neelam hands down the nicest and professional OB around. She is calm, and explains things in detail especially when you face infertility issues and eases your mind so that you can focus on a healthy pregnancy. Her staff is personable and helpful, they truly care for their patients. I would strongly recommend her to everyone as she will make your life that much easier during the most important and stressful times of carrying your little bundle of joy.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Walia is a caring, responsive, realistic practitioner. She explains her suggested treatment plan well, and is careful to keep up-to-date on my medical changes. She rescued me from menopausal symptoms when other doctors told me to just deal with it.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Walia has helped me with all my endometriosis needs, as well as other medical issues such as fibroids, and polyps . Last month had my last surgery and I am getting better every day and regaining my health and my life. Without her I was very weak and tired from anemia.  give her my highest recommendation if you are suffering from Endo.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am using Dr. Neelam services for my high risk pregnancy now. tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
